alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 9:36AM CDT until September 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Greene, George and Jackson Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 23.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Monday was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
